âœ¨ New Features:
â€¢ Update Notification System: GMs are now notified when a new version of Unboxing the Mystery is available. Includes patch highlights and a "Skip this version" option.

ğŸ› Bug Fixes:
â€¢ Lockpick Failure No Longer Reveals Items: Previously, when all lockpicks broke during an item reveal, the item was shown to the player anyway. Lockpick failure now correctly keeps the item hidden, and players can retry by reopening the item.
